title: Bug 8142 - No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: I don't understand Bug 8142. When I try to view the scoped type hierarchy of a binary project (e.g. org.apache.ant), I receive the following message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. By the way, can you please explain the meaning of this message?
OB: When viewing the scoped type hierarchy of a binary project (e.g. org.apache.ant), I receive the message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
EB: When viewing the scoped type hierarchy of a binary project (e.g. org.apache.ant), I expected to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars.
SR: 1. Open a binary project (e.g. org.apache.ant). 2. Try to view the scoped type hierarchy. 3. Observe the message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
